message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I'd like to counter with an offer of $85.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.
I'm still a bit higher than $87, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90, but I think I can do better than that. How about $91?
I see where we're at, Alice. Let me counter with an offer of $88.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $89, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.50.
I'm not going to go any lower than $90, Bob. I think we're close enough. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last counteroffer, so how about $88.50?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $88.
